'''Livestock''' may refer to:
* [[Cow]], a passive mob from the Overworld.
* [[Donkey]], a passive tameable and rideable mob from the Overworld.
* [[Horse]], a passive tameable and rideable mob from the Overworld.
* [[Goat]], a passive mob from the Overworld.
* [[Mule]], a tameable mob from breeding a horse and donkey.
* [[Pig]], a passive rideable mob from the Overworld.
* [[Sheep]], a passive mob from the Overworld.

== Advancements ==
* [[The Parrots and the Bats]], an advancement awarded to the player when any animal is bred.
* [[Two by Two]], an advancement awarded to the player when all animals have been bred.
